```{r, include=F, dependson="setup.R"}
## Exam 1 specific

library(tidyverse)
library(nycflights13)

set.seed(42)

flights <- flights %>% 
  slice_sample(prop=.35)
```


Which of the following code chunks would produce an output that could identify the ten most common destinations for flights from NYC airports?

A) `flights %>% count(dest) %>% arrange(desc(n)) %>% head(10)`
B) `flights %>% count(dest) %>% filter(n < 10)`
C) `flights %>% filter(percent_rank(dest) < .10)`
D) `flights %>% count(dest) %>% arrange(origin) %>% head()`
